original_text: And he said unto Jether his firstborn, Up, and slay them. But the youth drew not his sword: for he feared, because he was yet a youth.
korean_text: 그의 맏아들 여델에게 이르되 일어나 그들을 죽이라 하였으나 그 소년이 그의 칼을 빼지 못하였으니 이는 아직 어려서 두려워함이었더라

sentences.original_text: And he said unto Jether his firstborn,
But the youth drew not his sword:
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그 소년은 칼을 뽑지 아니하였으니

sentences.original_text: because he was yet a youth.
